ui_modal_updaterequired_title: Wallpaper Engine needs to be updated
ui_modal_updaterequired_body:
Please close Wallpaper Engine (right click the tray icon and click Quit) and restart it over [[[Platform]]] to receive the latest updates. If you keep getting this warning, please verify the application files over [[[Platform]]].

Application version: {{callerVersion}}, UI version: {{appVersion}}.
ui_modal_updateavailable_body_distro: A new update for Wallpaper Engine has been downloaded by [[[Platform]]] (version {{distroVersion}}). Would you like to restart Wallpaper Engine now to apply the update?
ui_modal_installationpath_error_title: Wrong Installation Path registered in Windows
ui_modal_installationpath_error_body:
It looks like the program files of Wallpaper Engine have been moved after the installation. This breaks the auto start function and causes a number of problems.

You are currently running Wallpaper Engine from {{runPath}} but [[[Platform]]] has installed Wallpaper Engine to {{steamPath}}. The auto start needs to be updated to use [[[Platform]]]'s correct installation path or this message will continue to appear.

Fix this now?
ui_modal_trial_version_start_body:
Thank you for trying Wallpaper Engine, we hope you will like our application. The trial will automatically expire after {{hrs}} hours of usage time.

Should you have any questions or run into any technical problems, please have a look at our help website as it covers almost all topics in great detail: help.wallpaperengine.io
ui_alert_connect_steam:
No first-time connection to [[[Platform]]] could be made

To remove this message forever: Make sure [[[Platform]]] is running and that you are logged into the correct [[[Platform]]] account and restart Wallpaper Engine. If you need help resolving this [[[Platform]]] issue, check our FAQ: Fix [[[Platform]]] Connection

If you do not own a legal copy of Wallpaper Engine: Please consider supporting our work. We have priced Wallpaper Engine very reasonably so that everyone can afford it. We have poured thousands of hours of work into this application and by buying Wallpaper Engine, you support its continued development, always receive the latest updates, help to pay for server costs and are able to download wallpapers via [[[Platform]]] with ease: Click here to buy Wallpaper Engine on [[[Platform]]]

This message will never appear again after you have started Wallpaper Engine through [[[Platform]]] once.
ui_browse_grid_no_results:
No wallpapers found for your search.
Expand or reset the categories in the filter sidebar or try another search term.
ui_browse_grid_no_results_generic:
No results found for your search.
Expand or reset the categories in the filter sidebar or try another search term.
ui_browse_advertise_explore: Click here to discover new wallpapers from the Workshop!
ui_browse_advertise_workshop: Click here to search the Workshop in detail!
ui_browse_no_service_body:
The [[[Platform]]] Workshop servers are currently not available. This is not a problem with Wallpaper Engine or your computer. Please wait a few hours and try again.

This is a [[[Platform]]] server problem and the [[[Platform]]] team is currently repairing the servers.
ui_browse_no_service_body_use_backup: Wallpaper Engine will now try to show an emergency backup until the [[[Platform]]] servers have been repaired by the [[[Platform]]] server team.
ui_browse_steam_offline_notice:
The [[[Platform]]] Workshop servers are offline. You are browsing an emergency backup from {{date}}.
This is not a problem with your computer or Wallpaper Engine. The [[[Platform]]] servers are currently being repaired and will be back online soon.
ui_browse_offline_error: [[[Platform]]] servers are offline. The [[[Platform]]] team is repairing the servers, please try again later.
ui_browse_details_local_editor_hint: Open this wallpaper in the editor to edit or delete it.
ui_browse_details_properties_reset_promp: Do you want to reset the current properties back to their defaults?
ui_browse_details_properties_preset_hint:
A Workshop preset includes all of your custom wallpaper settings and any images or videos you may have imported into the wallpaper.

You can publish them on the [[[Platform]]] Workshop just like regular wallpapers, allowing other users to experience the look and feel with the settings you have created. You can also download presets which other users have shared.
ui_browse_details_properties_apply_to_al: Apply to all Wallpapers and set Default Settings
Changes the default settings for all wallpapers on your current monitors or only changes these settings for the selected wallpapers.
Update all wallpapers and default settings
ui_browse_monitors_clone_hdr_hint: Windows does not support cloning from HDR to non-HDR displays.
ui_browse_modal_application_warning_body:
You are about to open an external application as a wallpaper:
{{filepath}}
Wallpaper Engine has no control over this file, you must ensure that it comes from a reliable source before proceeding.
ui_browse_modal_application_warning_disa: Don't ask again for this wallpaper
ui_browse_modal_unsubscribe_body:
Are you sure that you want to unsubscribe from: {{title}}?

After unsubscribing, [[[Platform]]] will delete the wallpaper files automatically after the wallpaper browse window is closed. [[[Platform]]] delays the deletion of wallpapers until you close the wallpaper browse window.
ui_browse_modal_unsubscribe_body_short: Are you sure that you want to unsubscribe from: {{title}}?
ui_browse_modal_remove_local_body: Are you sure that you want to remove the local wallpaper: {{title}}?
ui_browse_modal_remove_preset_info: The following presets are depending on the wallpaper(s) you are trying to unsubscribe and will be removed as well: {{presets}}
ui_browse_modal_subscribe_preset_body:
The wallpaper {{title}} is a preset for another wallpaper which you need to subscribe to as well to use it.

Subscribe to both now?
ui_browse_open_url_hotkey_info: To use your keyboard on the wallpaper, hide the icons with this hotkey first:
ui_browse_modal_advertise_workshop_body:
Use the filter sidebar on the left to select tags that match your wallpaper preferences.

Use the Approved filter to browse hand-picked, high-quality wallpapers.

Set the sort order in the upper right corner to Most Popular or Top Rated if you are looking for high-quality submissions.
ui_browse_modal_advertise_workshop_anime: Wallpaper Engine contains a lot of Anime wallpapers. Do you want to see Anime wallpapers?
You can change this option any time by opening the filter settings again.
ui_browse_modal_resolution_settings_body: By choosing the Recommended option below, Wallpaper Engine will apply the optimal resolution filters for your system.
ui_browse_modal_resolution_settings_pixe: If you would like to see wallpapers that might not be a good match for your screen setup or if you are specifically looking to use pixel art wallpapers, you should enable All resolutions.
ui_browse_modal_resolution_settings_show: Turning this option off will hide all wallpapers with the Other resolution tag.
ui_browse_playlist_empty: You have not created any playlists yet.
ui_browse_playlist_too_many_items: Too many wallpapers in the playlist to display.
ui_browse_playlist_modal_save_descriptio: If a playlist with the same name exists already, it will be overwritten.
ui_browse_playlist_modal_settings_video_: Change wallpaper when a video ends
ui_browse_playlist_modal_settings_update: Allow wallpaper to change while paused
ui_browse_playlist_modal_settings_begin_: Always begin with the first wallpaper
ui_browse_profiles_empty: You have not created any profiles yet.
ui_browse_profiles_modal_save_descriptio: If a profile with the same name exists already, it will be overwritten.
ui_browse_preset_modal_save_description: If a preset with the same name exists already, it will be overwritten.
ui_browse_preset_modal_empty: You have not created any presets for this wallpaper yet.
ui_browse_modal_no_steam_body:
[[[Sdk]]] could not be initialized. Please try to restart [[[Platform]]] and afterwards Wallpaper Engine. If you continue seeing this error, this means that your PC cannot correctly authenticate with the [[[Platform]]] servers, check your internet connection and whether you are logged into the correct [[[Platform]]] account.

Do not launch [[[Platform]]] as administrator, that prevents [[[Sdk]]] from connecting to [[[Platform]]]. An anti-virus or security software could be preventing [[[Platform]]] and Wallpaper Engine from working together as well, try turning that off.

Check the FAQ to get more help if needed: Fix [[[Platform]]] Connection
ui_browse_modal_no_steam_body_wrong_prov: You are running the [[[Platform]]] Edition of Wallpaper Engine in combination with a different version of [[[Platform]]]. Please restart Wallpaper Engine through [[[Platform]]] in order to access the Workshop for your specific version of the app. Alternatively, you can also log in to the correct [[[Platform]]] version for this edition of Wallpaper Engine.
ui_browse_query_error: [[[Platform]]] encountered an error, try again later: {{error}}
ui_browse_modal_safe_mode_body:
It looks like the program did not shut down correctly, the last wallpapers and plugins have not been loaded yet to prevent the issue from recurring.

Press OK to restore them now, or cancel to change them first.
ui_browse_explore_category_led_support: Great with Razer Chroma & Corsair iCUE {{emoji}}
ui_browse_explore_server_error: Cannot connect to Wallpaper Engine server to retrieve additional lists.
ui_browse_explore_prompt_to_vote: Vote here to help us find wallpapers that you like!
ui_browse_age_gate_modal_body: Please enter your birth date to continue:
ui_browse_age_gate_modal_sub: This data is for verification purposes only and will not be stored, uploaded or shared.
ui_browse_report_modal_category_genre_de: You are reporting this wallpaper for using an incorrect genre tag. Please consider which genre matches the wallpaper best by choosing what you can 'see' not what you 'know' about this wallpaper personally.
ui_browse_report_modal_category_rating_d: You are reporting this wallpaper for using an incorrect rating and violating the nudity and violence rules. If the wallpaper cannot be tagged as 'questionable' or 'mature', please choose the 'BAN' option, which will result in the wallpaper being removed.
ui_browse_report_modal_category_copyrigh: Please use [[[Platform]]]'s DMCA form to submit copyright violations, this will make sure it is dealt with in the legally correct manner.
ui_browse_report_modal_category_spam_des: You are reporting this wallpaper for spam by the author.
ui_browse_report_modal_category_offensiv: You are reporting this wallpaper for containing offensive content. Do not use this option to report nudity and instead choose the option 'wrong content rating'.
ui_browse_report_modal_category_other_de: Please choose the proper category before submitting your report! If it does not fit anywhere else, use this category.
ui_browse_report_modal_error: The report failed to be sent. The server might be offline, unreachable or undergoing maintenance. Try again later.
ui_browse_report_modal_error_401: The report failed to be sent. Your [[[Platform]]] game ticket seems to have expired. Please try restarting [[[Platform]]] and the wallpaper browser to get a new ticket.
ui_browse_modal_folder_remove_body: Are you sure that you want to remove this folder?
ui_browse_modal_folder_remove_unsubscrib: Unsubscribe or remove wallpapers in folder
ui_browse_download_missing_files: Missing files. Verify the program in [[[Platform]]].
ui_browse_modal_seasonal_info_body:
We have changed the theme of Wallpaper Engine to match the occasion! The theme will be changed back in a couple of days.

You can disable seasonal theming in the settings if you don't like this or change the skin there any time.

The Discover tab also has a special list of wallpapers that match the time of the year!
ui_browse_modal_steam_redownload_error_b:
Wallpaper Engine has detected that a lot of your wallpapers are being downloaded by [[[Platform]]] right now.

If you have recently subscribed a lot of new wallpapers, then please ignore this message and wait for [[[Platform]]] to finish downloading everything.

If it looks like [[[Platform]]] is downloading a lot of wallpapers that you already downloaded before, then [[[Platform]]] has run into an error. This is not a bug in Wallpaper Engine. Please see this post Fix [[[Platform]]] re-downloading everything or wait for [[[Platform]]] to finish downloading and fix itself.
ui_browse_modal_monitor_mismatch_body:
It looks like Wallpaper Engine cannot apply the wallpaper because it cannot properly identify your monitors.

Try restarting Wallpaper Engine completely. If you frequently have this issue, try disabling the high priority auto start option and use the normal auto start instead.

Additionally, try setting the Monitor Identification option to Layout in the General tab of the settings to avoid this issue.
ui_browse_modal_trial_reminder_body:
The wallpapers you subscribed just now are really cool, aren't they? Purchase Wallpaper Engine now, you will get:

* Free to download all creative wallpapers.
* You will find new wallpapers every day from many content creators.
* Use the editor to create and publish your own wallpaper.
ui_browse_alert_active_application_rule: The application rule for {{executable}} is currently active and overriding your wallpaper selection.
ui_browse_alert_trial_reminder: Purchase Wallpaper Engine now and you will enjoy: easily downloading Workshop wallpapers including some exclusive ones on [[[Platform]]].
ui_browse_alert_vram_exhausted: Your video memory is exhausted and the wallpapers have been disabled until your system has enough resources again. This feature can be turned off in the general settings.
ui_browse_alert_remote_steamdown: The [[[Platform]]] servers are currently experiencing technical issues and certain Workshop features may not work properly for you. This may include slow search response times or incomplete search results. This problem affects all [[[Platform]]] users and is unrelated to Wallpaper Engine or your computer. You can ignore this message if everything works well for you.
ui_settings_gfx_fps_warning: High FPS may slow down your PC!
ui_settings_gfx_fps_warning_high: High FPS may slow down your PC! We're serious, this is too much ðŸ”¥.
ui_settings_gfx_tooltip_warn_post_proces: Ultra mode adds HDR bloom to supported wallpapers and is only recommended for powerful high-end desktop graphics cards.
ui_settings_gfx_tooltip_warn_msaa: x8 MSAA is only recommended for powerful high-end desktop graphics cards.
ui_settings_seasonal_theme_hint: Changes the theme during special times of the year.
ui_settings_hotkeys_group_wallpaper_stub: You can assign hotkeys to wallpapers, playlists or profiles in the wallpaper browser.
ui_settings_hotkeys_modal_prompt_overrid: This key is already assigned to '{{action}}'. Do you want to assign it here instead?
ui_settings_hotkeys_example:
Hotkeys must contain Ctrl, Shift, Alt. Examples:

Shift + Ctrl + B
Shift + F1

A red border means that your hotkey is not valid.
ui_settings_adjust_windows_color_light_t: You are using the Windows 'light' theme which does not allow colors on the task bar. To be able to change the color of your task bar, change the Windows theme to 'dark'.
ui_settings_adjust_windows_color_warning:
IMPORTANT: Please be aware that enabling this feature will modify the look and feel of your Windows. Wallpaper Engine is not able to revert back to your current theme. If you wish to revert to your old design, you need to manually change your Windows Theme color settings.

If you don't know how to do that or if you use an unactivated version of Windows that doesn't allow you to do that, please DO NOT enable this feature!

The colors cannot be reverted by Wallpaper Engine. They can be reverted in the Windows settings instead.
ui_settings_advanced_unpause_during_aero: Enabling this option will unpause Wallpaper Engine when any translucent Windows elements overlay the desktop, including the fullscreen start menu, the Windows task view switcher or while using Alt + Tab.
ui_settings_plugins_options_delay_load_h:
You can use this option to delay the loading of all plugins. This can be useful if you are having issues with plugins after starting your system when Wallpaper Engine starts up faster than other programs or drivers on your computer.

For example, if the hardware LED effects do not work correctly after starting your system, set this option to 60 or 120 seconds and see if that allows the LED plugin to work correctly. Higher numbers are safer but also mean a longer delay until plugins take effect after your system starts.
ui_settings_plugins_options_led_plugin_d: Controls LED effects from Corsair and Razer devices.
ui_settings_advanced_reset_config_modal_: The entire application will be reset, all of your settings will be removed and Wallpaper Engine needs to restart.
ui_settings_advanced_monitor_identificat:
This setting controls how Wallpaper Engine assigns wallpapers to individual screens. If you have any issues with wallpapers being swapped between monitors or wallpapers not showing up after restarting or hibernating your PC, try changing this option. Due to the variety of issues in graphics drivers and Windows itself, there is no generally recommended setting and you may need to try multiple options.

Device Path
This assigns wallpapers directly to the name of the graphics card adapter and the name of the monitor. If you change the graphics card cables or change your screen, the wallpaper has to be selected for the new configuration again. However, you can change the multi-monitor layout or the primary monitor and the wallpapers will stay where you assigned them. This is a stable and the recommended method. You will not have problems with this unless your graphics driver has severe issues.

Layout
This orders the monitors based on their virtual position in Windows. If you change the multi-monitor layout, change your primary monitor, or remove monitors then the program may not restore the wallpapers the way you expect. You should use this option only if your driver gives you too many problems with the default 'Device Path' option and if you do not change your monitors regularly.

GDI
Identify monitors based on how Windows orders and names them. If this option works for you, you will be able to restore the same wallpaper to every monitor even if you replace the monitors themselves but keep their general position. Has a high probability of swapping wallpapers randomly every time you start the PC or resume from sleep - for many people this is relatively prone to errors and won't work well.

Deprecated
Similar to the 'GDI' option which uses an older method of identifying monitors. It is generally the most error-prone option but in rare cases it may solve Windows or graphics card driver-related issues. Only try this as a last resort.
ui_settings_advanced_sleep_hack_tip:
Use this option if you have any compatibility issues after Windows hibernation. This will make the program fully restart after hibernation to fix issues caused by other programs on the computer.

Fix crash after hibernation
If Wallpaper Engine crashes after hibernation, then Windows is not correctly restoring the graphics driver and Wallpaper Engine in order. This option may help on your system to fix this.

Fix LED effects after hibernation
Some LED utilities may block the connection to Wallpaper Engine after hibernation and the LED effects will stop working. This option may help fixing this by fully restarting Wallpaper Engine and making it reconnect to the LED utilities.
ui_settings_advanced_sleep_hack_error_au: You need to enable the auto start option with high priority at the top of this page before you can use this.
ui_settings_advanced_sleep_hack_enable_w:
Only use this option if you experience issues with Wallpaper Engine after hibernation.

This option is only required if something causes Wallpaper Engine to stop working properly after hibernation and it will make it restart every time you set Windows to hibernate.
ui_settings_advanced_restart_setting_mod: The program needs to be restarted to apply the settings. Restart now?
ui_settings_disable_slideshow_tip: When this option is enabled, Wallpaper Engine will attempt to remove the wallpaper fade effect that Windows uses by default when switching Windows wallpapers and when logging into Windows. Removing this Windows behavior is not perfectly possible and the fade effect may still flash up for a brief moment.
ui_settings_restart_after_crash_hint:
This option will make Wallpaper Engine immediately restart itself after it crashed and it will disable crash notifications in the main application.

You should absolutely not enable this option unless you have no other choice.

Wallpaper Engine itself is very stable and should not crash under normal circumstances. This option solely exists to combat crashes on unstable systems due to faulty graphics drivers or aggressive software that makes Wallpaper Engine helplessly crash.

You can interrupt the automatic restart by holding the ESCAPE key down.
ui_settings_highpriority_warning:
High priority mode will launch the application more quickly using a 'Windows service'. But if you are experiencing issues with this solution, try it without high priority, which will be more reliable but slower.

This option will also make the program auto start for all Windows accounts on this PC.
ui_welcome_intro:
This is a short introduction to get you started and to configure a few important options for you.

Everything you adjust here can also be changed in the Wallpaper Engine settings at a later time!
ui_welcome_quality_body: Choose a quality preset to personalize performance and visual fidelity (if applicable for the wallpaper). You can further customize these options in the settings later:
ui_welcome_windows_color_description: Let wallpapers adjust your Windows border color automatically:
ui_welcome_use_dark_theme_description: Use a dark theme for the program:
ui_welcome_autostart_description: Show animated wallpapers when Windows starts by quietly launching Wallpaper Engine in the background when your computer starts (recommended):
ui_welcome_finish_body:
Everything is set up!

Wallpaper Engine is now available in your system tray. Double-click to select a wallpaper or right-click to access the settings, the [[[Platform]]] Workshop or the Wallpaper Editor.
ui_welcome_use_led_effects_description: Enabling this option will sync the colors of wallpapers with compatible Razer Chroma and Corsair iCUE devices.
ui_editor_modal_duplicate_texture_body:
This will duplicate the texture, so you can modify it on this layer without affecting other layers that use this same texture.

This is can be useful if you have previously duplicated the whole layer or the effect, but keep in mind that this will increase the required memory of the wallpaper too.
ui_editor_modal_video_file_invalid_body:
The selected video file {{file}} is too large. You can only upload videos to Workshop that are smaller than {{size}}.

This restriction is only for the Workshop, you can of course still use this video as a wallpaper for yourself by simply dragging it into the wallpaper browser or clicking Open Wallpaper in the browser.
ui_editor_modal_project_files_invalid_bo:
The selected project files are too large. You can only upload a project to the Workshop that is smaller than {{size}}.

This restriction is only for the Workshop, you can of course still use this project as a wallpaper for yourself by simply dragging it into the wallpaper browser or clicking Open Wallpaper in the browser.
ui_editor_delete_project_modal_body:
Are you sure that you want to permanently delete the project:
{{title}} ?

You will not be able to update or use this project after deleting it.
ui_editor_no_animation_modal_body:
It looks like you are trying to upload a scene wallpaper without animation. This is not recommended.

Wallpaper Engine is optimized for animated wallpapers, so if you only want to use a static image, it is advisable to use your operating system in that case.

Do you want to continue anyway?
ui_editor_review_info_body:
Your wallpaper will be reviewed before other users can find and download it to ensure that it doesn't violate any local laws.

If you update your wallpaper, it has to be reviewed again and is pushed to the back of the queue.
ui_editor_modal_unsaved_changes_body: You have unsaved changes in your project. Would you like to save or discard them now?
ui_editor_modal_delete_published_wallpap: Any Workshop uploads you delete from this list will be deleted from the [[[Platform]]] Workshop entirely. All contents will also be deleted from every user who has subscribed to it via [[[Platform]]].

Are you sure that you want to permanently delete {{title}} from the [[[Platform]]] Workshop?

The Workshop upload will be permanently deleted from the [[[Platform]]] Workshop and for every user who has subscribed to it.
ui_editor_camera_select_path: Please select a path on the left.
ui_editor_welcome_modal_hint_text: New to Wallpaper Engine? Be sure to check out the official designer documentation for extensive guides and useful tips:
ui_editor_welcome_modal_hint_backup_text: Tip: Back up your project files when switching computers!
ui_editor_welcome_modal_resize_alert: Your image has a resolution of {{width}} x {{height}} pixels which is not a common display resolution. It's recommended to let Wallpaper Engine resize the image for you.
ui_editor_welcome_modal_resize_alert_por: Your image is an upright portrait image with a resolution of {{width}} x {{height}} pixels. Unless you have a portrait monitor, a lot of the image will be cut off.
ui_editor_importer_crop_transparency_hel:
The transparent area will be cropped and your image will be resized to improve performance.

If you update your image later, make sure to not shrink or extend the transparent area, since that could cause issues with existing effects that you have added.
ui_editor_importer_crop_transparency_war: It looks like the transparent area of the image changed. If you have any effects on this image already you might have to fix them if you continue to import this image.
ui_editor_importer_gif_warning_body:
The GIF you are trying to import occupies a lot of memory when converted into a more usable format. Wallpaper Engine can try to convert it anyway, but the process might fail with an error.

The GIF format is generally unsuitable for high resolution images and/or a lot of frames, you should consider using an .mp4 video wallpaper because that would perform better.
ui_editor_publish_modal_steam_error:
[[[Platform]]] has encountered the following error:

{{error}}

Make sure no firewall or antivirus app is interfering with [[[Platform]]]. Restart [[[Platform]]] and try again later in case there are temporary server or network issues.
ui_editor_publish_modal_publish_prompt_a: You need to accept the [[[Platform]]] Workshop agreement before your wallpaper will be visible to others. View your wallpaper on the [[[Platform]]] Workshop now:
ui_editor_publish_modal_progress_uploadi: Submitting Workshop item, uploading preview image...
ui_editor_publish_modal_snapshot_resolut: Please use a preview image that is no larger than {{size}} pixels.
ui_editor_publish_modal_info_asset_reuse: By uploading an asset to the [[[Platform]]] Workshop, you agree that other users may re-use and possibly re-upload modified versions of your asset without notice to you. Deleted assets will still persist in already created wallpapers.
ui_editor_publish_assets_modal_header_al: You are about to publish an Asset, not a wallpaper. Please do not publish whole wallpapers with this menu. If you want to publish a wallpaper, click this message.
ui_editor_publish_assets_modal_select_as: Please choose what kind of assets you would like to share on the Workshop:
Publish as asset pack. Users will be able to import each layer separately.
ui_editor_publish_assets_modal_select_la: Select the layers that you would like to share:
There are no eligible layers to choose for sharing.
ui_editor_publish_assets_modal_select_ef: Select the effect that you would like to share:
There are no eligible effects to choose for sharing.
ui_editor_warn_advanced_assets_creation_:
This option should only be used by advanced users who are familiar with the editor and have published a few Scene wallpapers before.

Enabling this will add buttons to the editor that allow you to create new single assets to be shared on the Workshop for others to re-use in their own wallpapers.
ui_editor_effect_list_modal_create_new_e:
You are about to create a new, editable effect. You can change the shaders in any way you like.

Choose a unique name for the new effect:
ui_editor_effect_list_modal_create_dupli:
You are about to duplicate the effect '{{effect}}' and create a new, editable effect where you can change the shaders in any way you like.

Choose a unique name for the new effect:
ui_editor_effect_list_modal_delete_effec:
Are you sure that you want to delete the effect '{{effect}}'?

This will break all usages of that effect inside the wallpaper and this cannot be undone!
ui_editor_workshop_modal_rating_body: The preview image must be suitable for everyone. Please refer to this table to choose an appropriate content rating. If in doubt, choose a more restrictive rating. Submitting illegal content or rating your submission too low can get the submission banned and the account flagged. Keep in mind that you do not need to submit wallpapers to use them for yourself.
ui_editor_workshop_modal_rating_no_ratin: Please make sure that any content you upload is suitable for everyone! If you upload anything questionable or illegal, your submission or your entire account may be banned.
ui_editor_animation_toggle_bezier: Toggle BÃ©zier interpolation at keyframe (left, right, both, none)
ui_editor_animation_help_modal_lock_poin: Lock points vertically while moving them.
ui_editor_animation_help_modal_zoom: Use the mouse wheel to zoom. Hold down SHIFT or CTRL to zoom vertically.
ui_editor_animation_help_modal_select_po: Click points to select them. Hold down SHIFT or CTRL to select mutiple points or draw a rectangle with the mouse button.
ui_editor_animation_help_modal_copy_past: Use CTRL + C or V to copy or paste all selected points.
ui_editor_animation_help_modal_delete: Press DEL to delete all selected points.
ui_editor_animation_help_modal_autokeyfr: Press A to toggle auto-keyframing on or off.
ui_editor_animation_help_modal_keyframe: Press K to insert or remove keyframes at the current point in time.
ui_editor_animation_help_modal_update_ke: Press U to update an existing keyframe at the current point in time (only when auto keyframing is disabled).
ui_editor_animation_help_modal_jump_fram: Press LEFT or RIGHT to go one keyframe to the left or right.
ui_editor_animation_help_modal_play_paus: Press SPACE to play or pause the animation.
ui_editor_settings_auto_saving_hint: General project settings and certain assets like textures and puppets will still be saved automatically.
ui_editor_user_properties_select_info: Choose a property with a compatible type ({{types}}).
ui_editor_user_properties_select_unused_: This property is not being used by the wallpaper.
ui_editor_user_properties_combo_value: Selected combo value for this link:
ui_editor_snapshot_instructions:
1. Draw a rectangle with the mouse.
2. Press enter to take a snapshot.

Press Space to pause.
Press Escape to cancel.
ui_editor_workshop_rules_modal_body: Before submitting your wallpaper to the Workshop, make sure that it does not violate the [[[Platform]]] Terms of Service, otherwise it will be removed:
ui_editor_workshop_rules_modal_list_head: In particular, the following rules exist for wallpapers, the preview image and description:
ui_editor_workshop_rules_modal_rule_nudi: No photographic/real life pornography or nudity
ui_editor_scene_options_bloom_hint: Please note: Bloom effects require post-processing to be enabled in Wallpaper Engine performance settings.
ui_editor_scene_options_bloom_hdr_settin: You should test standard and HDR bloom to ensure the wallpaper looks good for everyone.
ui_editor_effects_modal_imagelayer_descr: Import an image from your computer.
ui_editor_effects_modal_fullscreenlayer_: Add a translucent layer that covers the entire screen. Any effects applied to this layer will affect objects that have been drawn to the screen before this layer.
ui_editor_effects_modal_solidlayer_descr: Adds a solid layer with a background of a simple color. Can be used in combination with other effects.
ui_editor_effects_modal_composelayer_des: Add a translucent layer of specific size. Attach other objects as children to this layer to combine them into a single texture which you can apply effects to.
ui_editor_effects_modal_model_descriptio: Import a 3D model from your computer.
ui_editor_effects_modal_particle_system_: Create a new particle effect from scratch.
ui_editor_effects_modal_sound_descriptio: Add looping background music or randomly playing ambient sounds.
ui_editor_effects_modal_compatibility_wa:
You are about to import an effect with a newer version than used by this project. This may result in all instances of this effect being reset and you will lose their settings.

This is not reversible and your old settings will be lost. You may want to make a backup of the project before proceeding.

Do you want to continue?
ui_editor_effect_blend_description: Blend two images or image layers with various blend modes.
ui_editor_effect_blur_description: Apply coarse gaussian blur to the image. Supports an optional mask.
ui_editor_effect_blur_precise_descriptio: Apply gaussian blur to the entire image in full resolution.
ui_editor_effect_color_key_description: Mask a part of the image that matches a color of choice.
ui_editor_effect_edge_detection_descript: Detects edges of the image using the sobel filter.
ui_editor_effect_foliage_sway_descriptio: Sways the object in each corner of the image.
ui_editor_effect_godrays_description: Add directional or circular god rays.
ui_editor_effect_local_contrast_descript: Apply a local contrast enhancement to the image.
ui_editor_effect_motion_blur_description: Accumulates the image over time to create a motion blur effect.
ui_editor_effect_opacity_description: Adds an opacity mask to the image.
ui_editor_effect_pulse_description: Add flickering and pulsating light effects to the image.
ui_editor_effect_reflection_description: Adds a reflection effect to the image. Draw a mask to define where the reflection should appear.
ui_editor_effect_scroll_description: Scrolls the image horizontally or vertically.
ui_editor_effect_shake_description: Adds a shake animation. Only masked areas will be affected. Rigid and smooth animations can be achieved.
ui_editor_effect_tint_description: Tint the image with a color of choice.
ui_editor_effect_transform_description: Apply scaling, rotation and offsets to the image.
ui_editor_effect_vhs_description: Distortion and colorization of an old video tape.
ui_editor_effect_water_flow_description: Adds a flow animation. The direction can be controlled with a flow mask that you can paint in the editor.
ui_editor_effect_water_ripple_descriptio: Adds a ripple animation. Draw a mask to limit the animation to a specific area of the image.
ui_editor_effect_water_waves_description: Adds a simple wave effect using sines.
ui_editor_effect_fire_description: Adds a fire stream to the image. Color can be freely modified.
ui_editor_effect_xray_description: Blends between two images based on cursor position.
ui_editor_effect_shine_description: Applies a shine effect to bright parts of the image with a variable number of edges.
ui_editor_effect_refract_description: Distorts the background based on a normal map, allows blending with an optional albedo texture too.
ui_editor_effect_iris_description: Animates the eyes of a character to look around realistically.
ui_editor_preset_light_shafts_descriptio: Adds light shafts to the wallpaper.
ui_editor_preset_snow_particles_descript: Adds snow particles slowly falling from the top of the screen.
ui_editor_preset_rain_description: Adds rain particles. Optionally with refraction/distortion of the background image.
ui_editor_preset_interactive_description: Interactive particles that are affected by the cursor.
ui_editor_preset_clock_description: Insert a clock into your scene.
ui_editor_preset_countdown_description: Insert a countdown into your scene.
ui_editor_script_unsaved_changes_body: There are unsaved changes. Do you want to keep them?
ui_editor_script_workshop_browse_empty: Empty - subscribe to scripts on Workshop
ui_editor_properties_led_source: Limit iCUE & Chroma to this layer
ui_editor_properties_move_bone_in_front_: Move Bone in front of Parent
ui_editor_properties_reset_all_weights_m: Are you sure that you want to reset all vertex weights to their defaults?
ui_editor_properties_select_parent_bone: Select a parent bone to link to.
ui_editor_properties_update_bone_mask_in: Select the bones that should be part of this animation.
ui_editor_particle_delete_particle_body: Are you sure you want to delete the particle system {{particle}}?
ui_editor_particle_duplicate_particle_bo: Enter the name of the new particle system:
ui_editor_particle_new_particle_body: Enter the name of the new particle system:
ui_editor_particle_add_element_emitter_b: Select an emitter that creates new particles.
ui_editor_particle_add_element_initializ: Select an initializer that is applied when a particle spawns.
ui_editor_particle_add_element_operator_: Select an operator that simulates the particle over time.
ui_editor_particle_add_element_renderer_: Select a renderer that controls the way particles are displayed.
ui_editor_particle_add_element_children_: Select an existing particle system as a child.
ui_editor_properties_geometry_warning_bo:
This image is not suitable for the puppet warp animation system.

You should import an image/character that has a transparent background in order for puppet warp to work correctly.

You can either have each limb/animated part as a separate object on the image, or just cut the character/object out of the image and make the background fully transparent.
ui_editor_puppet_warp_edit_warning_body:
If you continue to edit this creation stage of the puppet warp, you will reset all following creation stages and have to re-do them from scratch.
All existing animations for this puppet will be deleted.
ui_editor_puppet_warp_delete_warning_bod:
Are you sure that you want to delete this puppet warp model and all its animations?

This action cannot be undone.

The puppet warp will be deleted from all layers that are using this image.
ui_provider_error_logged_on_elsewhere: [[[Platform]]] user is logged on a different computer.
ui_provider_error_file_not_found: [[[Platform]]] could not find or access certain files on your hard disk.
ui_provider_error_servers_busy: [[[Platform]]]'s servers are unresponsive and may be overloaded or down entirely.
ui_provider_error_access_denied: [[[Platform]]] is denying access. This usually means your account is banned or temporarily restricted.
ui_provider_error_timeout: [[[Platform]]] aborted the request since it took too much time to process.
ui_provider_error_io_failure: [[[Platform]]] has run into problems reading or writing files to and from your hard disk.
ui_provider_error_read_only: [[[Platform]]] service is read-only. If you changed your password recently, [[[Platform]]] does not allow uploading new content. This problem usually resolves itself after a few days.
